```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(mapview)
library(leafsync)

Maiz_INTA <- read_sf("Pergamino/maiz_2020.shp") 
Soja_INTA <- read_sf("Pergamino/soja_2020_f.shp")
Soja_Feb <- read_sf("Pergamino/soja_feb.shp")
Maiz_Feb <- read_sf("Pergamino/maiz_feb.shp")


p1 <- mapview(Soja_Feb, col.regions="red", color="red")+
  mapview(Soja_INTA, color="blue")

p2<-mapview(Maiz_Feb, col.regions="red", color="red")+
  mapview(Maiz_INTA, color="blue")

sync(p1, p2)
```
